pr_title: Issue #7765: XpathRegression tests added for UnnecessaryParentheses

timeline.bodyText:
Could you add more tests please. From #5777:

2: Must have a UT for each log in the check. If the check has 3 separate log calls, then it must have 3 separate UTs.
timeline.author: rdiachenko
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.author: rdiachenko

replies.bodyText:
Could you please help me figure out what kind of errors are being logged by this log call? I figured something out but ended up finding a bug instead. #8239
@rdiachenko
replies.author: shashwatj07

replies.bodyText:
@shashwat70 , sorry for a delayed response.
Please take a look at this test - https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/master/src/test/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/coding/UnnecessaryParenthesesCheckTest.java . It should cover that branch. Put a break point and try to debug yourself. If you still have problems please let me know.
replies.author: rdiachenko
